Descript AI Tool

March 1
6250

Description

Descript is an audio/video editor that includes transcription, a screen recorder, publishing, and AI tools like ultra-realistic voice cloning with Overdub, free voice models, privacy first features, ability to make mid-sentence changes to real recordings, creating multiple voices, sharing with trusted collaborators, and a high quality stock voice library. It also provides 44.1KHz broadcast quality speech synthesizer and a live Overdubing.

Price Model:

  • Paid
  • This tool offers a free trial!

Tags:

  • Speech
  • Design
  • Marketing
  • Code
Visit
Visit website

GPT-3 Playground Features

Upword simplifies content creation by offering a centralized location for the entire workflow, from idea to publishing. Its all-in-one solution streamlines the process, reducing errors and delays. With a user-friendly interface and comprehensive features, Upword maximizes productivity and efficiency. Optimize your content workflow today with Upword.

  • Add comments, both your own and those created by AI;
  • Attach links and media files;
  • Highlight what's important - Artificial Intelligence can help with this, too;
  • Simplify complex and translate foreign texts;
  • Listen to finished excerpts using the built-in audio tools.

How to use GPT-3 Playground

The process of working with Upword is simple and intuitive. The platform has a web version, but it is more convenient to use the extension for Google Chrome.

It can be found in the official Google Store. In order to start using the tool, all you have to do is open the article you want to cut and run the extension.

Buy the product

It can be found in the official Google Store. In order to start using the tool, all you have to do is open the article you want to cut and run the extension.

Start using

Who is best fit for GPT-3 Playground

The tool will be useful to everyone who works with texts - not necessarily at a professional level. AI saves time - it makes it easier to follow the news, shorten articles from any source, and listen to finished material on the go.

Upword themselves identify the following categories of users who will benefit from their AI:

  • Students. Summarize a book, a research paper, a report - few students can say they don't have enough reading;
  • Entrepreneurs. AI will help businessmen not to lose time in searching for important information for them. Squeeze out current news, reports, business research-anything to keep up with changes in the workplace;
  • Marketers, advertisers, content managers. Write a blog post, make a progress report, or cut a lengthy online research, AI will be useful to anyone who works in media;
  • Executives, leads, managers. Often in a management job, you have to write a resume for management - with AI, this will be a quick and easy task. Upword features allow you to share finished reports and texts with the entire team.

GPT-3 Playground Pricing

The platform has a free trial period of 7 days and several paid subscription options:

  • Monthly - this will cost $15;
  • Annual - the $150 price includes two free months.

Upword has a student discount of 66%. To get it, you have to prove that you are actually studying.

Submit a tool

Before submitting:

We appreciate your interest in sharing your favorite AI tools with us. Before submitting your tool, please ensure that it hasn't been already listed on our site. Our team reviews each submission manually to ensure its quality and relevance to our audience.

Please note that we do not accept affiliate links or newsletter submissions. Also, if you are submitting a tool aggregator similar to wAild world, it will only be considered if you have a reciprocal listing of tool aggregators that includes wAild world.

Lastly, we strictly prohibit the use of bots or any other fraudulent methods to upvote submissions. We monitor all activity closely and any attempts to cheat the system will result in immediate disqualification.

Thank you for your cooperation in maintaining the integrity of our service.
